name: Turin Flying School
baseAirport: Turin Caselle Sandro Pertini international Airport
about: Turin Flying School, located in Caselle Torinese, Italy, specializes in air traffic controller training. With a focus on comprehensive and specialized education, the school equips students with the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in air traffic control. The training programs are designed to meet the highest standards, ensuring graduates are well-prepared for their roles in managing air traffic safely and efficiently. For inquiries, contact us at Strada San Maurizio 12, 10072 Caselle Torinese, Italy, or reach out via phone at 39 011 56 78 366. We are committed to providing top-notch training to shape the future of air traffic control professionals.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School
EASA ATPL Ab Initio"]
